summary: This bill, the Executive Order 14286 Act of 2025 (H.R. 3799), aims to codify Executive Order 14286. It seeks to give the force of law to the executive order, which concerns enforcing rules of the road for truck drivers. Introduced in the House of Representatives by Mr. Burchett and referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, the bill essentially elevates an existing executive order to the status of a law, ensuring its consistent application.
